attributes.action: return all immigrants ,who fail to find work within 6 months of being granted residency,or who are convicted of any offence incurring  a prison sentence , irrespective of whether it contravenes their human rights at the expense of other UK residents ,back to their country of origin , especially if they are fit ,healthy and single.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: considering the statistics that a lot of violent crimes are committed by immigrants who also receive benefits when they are capable of working,then they are not good citizens and should therefore be deported
